page.title: 04Our School (sheet 2)
page.content: In the upper half of our school Mrs.Hammond takes the 7-8 year olds in class 4.Mrs.Henderson takes the 9-10 year olds in class 5.Mr.Walker takes the 10-11 year olds in class 6.Mr Harris the headmaster and if he is away Mr Walker takes over charge of the school.Blackmoor school has a very nice 6mx12m heated outdoor swimming pool as well as a small size playground which we hope will be extended in the near future.Blackmoor School has it's own tree nursery where the children in the top two classes plant many different trees.The headmaster and the children have taken an interest in golf so we have got two golf greens and also the school's own supply of golf clubs.The caretaker is called Mr Gale.The school is in two parts,the 'hut' and the main school. By Hilary Taylor and Gary Perry.
